conbody.p: This section describes dimensioning of storage nodes. Storage nodes provide dedicated storage for Cinder (volumes), Glance (images), Swift (objects), and Nova ephemeral storage in the Standard Configuration with Dedicated Storage. Storage nodes are deployed as a pair using a cluster of disks across the two nodes for scalability and redundancy.
For additional details and hard limits of the storage node hardware, including the list of supported NICs that are supported on storage nodes, refer to Titanium Server Planning: .
